Mr. Eric Schmidt said Mr. Page would merge Google's technology and business vision, while he would focus on external issues, like "deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships." allowing staff to search children for any material that may disrupt lessons feature in the Bill, while rules forcing schools to give parents 24-hour notice of a detention will also be scrapped. Mr Michael Gove said: This Government backs teachers. All the evidence from those countries with great education systems tells us that nothing is more important than attracting great people into teaching and supporting them in the classroom. "Teachers will be free to impose the penalties they need to keep order and free from the red tape which swallows up teaching time, so they can get on with their first duty- raising standards. Plans to axe a number of education quangos will feature in the Bill, as will the legislation required to allow the Government to charge university students higher rates of interest on tuition fee loans.

Steve Ballmer , chief executive of Microsoft, said the partnership would dramatically accelerate the development of a vibrant and strong Windows Phone ecosystem. Nokia and Microsoft have been working on the development of the first of the new phones for two months, but it will be about a year before the new phones hit the market.

prove he's more than just a pretty voice- and it seems that Simon Cowell agrees. The Mirror reports that Simon Cowell phoned his new signing from his mansion in Barbados during the festive break. Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs. They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed. the 76ers had two jerseys made up: one for Allen Iverson and one for Stephon Marbury , the other talented point guard in the draft. After the second workout, Brad Greenberg knew the Stephon Marbury jersey would not be needed. He's a special athlete and a special competitor and he has leadership ability, Brad Greenberg said of Allen Iverson . "He made it an easy decision."
